verses.verse: וַיָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> Then came אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> certain מִזִּקְנֵ֖י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> unto me and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> before פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these הֶעֱל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> have set up גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1544><s%> their idols עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in לִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> in their heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <S%H4383><s%> the stumblingblock עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquity נָתְנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and put נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> their face הַאִדָּרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> should I be enquired אִדָּרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> of at all לָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore דַּבֵּר־ <S%H1696><s%> Therefore speak א֠וֹתָם <S%H853><s%> וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> unto them and say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Every man אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> that setteth up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּלּוּלָ֜יו <S%H1544><s%> his idols אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֤וֹל <S%H4383><s%> the stumblingblock עֲוֹנוֹ֙ <S%H5771><s%> of his iniquity יָשִׂים֙ <S%H7760><s%> and putteth נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> before פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> and cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> to the prophet אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD נַעֲנֵ֧יתִי <S%H6030><s%> will answer ל֦וֹ [בָהּ כ] (בָ֖א ק) בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> according to the multitude גִּלּוּלָֽיו׃ <S%H1544><s%> of his idols

לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> order תְּפֹ֥שׂ <S%H8610><s%> That I may take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> in their own heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who נָזֹ֙רוּ֙ <S%H2114><s%> because they are all estranged מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> and בְּגִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> from me through their idols כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Therefore say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD שׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Repent וְהָשִׁ֔יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> from גִּלּֽוּלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> [yourselves] from your idols וּמֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H8441><s%> from all your abominations הָשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn away פְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> your faces

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> For every one אִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> anyone מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמֵהַגֵּר֮ <S%H1616><s%> or of the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וְיִנָּזֵ֣ר <S%H5144><s%> which separateth מֵֽאַחֲרַ֗י <S%H310><s%> himself from me וְיַ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> and setteth up גִּלּוּלָיו֙ <S%H1544><s%> his idols אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <S%H4383><s%> the stumblingblock עֲוֹנ֔וֹ <S%H5771><s%> of his iniquity יָשִׂ֖ים <S%H7760><s%> and putteth נֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> before פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> and cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> to a prophet לִדְרָשׁ־ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire ל֣וֹ בִ֔י אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of him concerning me I the LORD נַֽעֲנֶה־ <S%H6030><s%> will answer לּ֖וֹ בִּֽי׃

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> And I will set פָנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against that man הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַהֲשִֽׂמֹתִ֙יהוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> and will make לְא֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> him a sign וְלִמְשָׁלִ֔ים <S%H4912><s%> and a proverb וְהִכְרַתִּ֖יו <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut him off מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from the midst עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> of my people וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס

וְהַנָּבִ֤יא <S%H5030><s%> And if the prophet כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יְפֻתֶּה֙ <S%H6601><s%> be deceived וְדִבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> when he hath spoken דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> a thing אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD פִּתֵּ֔יתִי <S%H6601><s%> have deceived אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַנָּבִ֣יא <S%H5030><s%> that prophet הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> and I וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> and I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> my hand עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against וְהִ֨שְׁמַדְתִּ֔יו <S%H8045><s%> upon him and will destroy מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> him from the midst עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וְנָשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> And they shall bear עֲוֹנָ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> the punishment of their iniquity כַּֽעֲוֹן֙ <S%H5771><s%> the punishment הַדֹּרֵ֔שׁ <S%H1875><s%> of him that seeketh כַּעֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> shall be even as the punishment הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> of the prophet יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

לְ֠מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> order לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> may no יִתְע֨וּ <S%H8582><s%> may go no more astray ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> That the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאַֽחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> from me וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יִטַּמְּא֥וּ <S%H2930><s%> neither be polluted ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6588><s%> any more with all their transgressions וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֣י לְעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> but that they may be my people וַֽאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and I may be their God נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came again to me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> when the land כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if תֶחֱטָא־ <S%H2398><s%> sinneth לִי֙ לִמְעָל־ <S%H4603><s%> against me by trespassing מַ֔עַל <S%H4604><s%> grievously וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> then will I stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against וְשָׁבַ֥רְתִּי <S%H7665><s%> upon it and will break לָ֖הּ מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> the staff לָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of the bread וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> thereof and will send בָ֣הּ רָעָ֔ב <S%H7458><s%> famine וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> upon it and will cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> both אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and beast

וְ֠הָיוּ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> Though these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H582><s%> men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> even these בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> were in it נֹ֖חַ <S%H5146><s%> Noah [דָּנִאֵל כ] (דָּנִיאֵ֣ל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel ק) וְאִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> and Job הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> by בְצִדְקָתָם֙ <S%H6666><s%> by their righteousness יְנַצְּל֣וּ <S%H5337><s%> they should deliver נַפְשָׁ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> [but] their own souls נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

לֽוּ־ <S%H3863><s%> If חַיָּ֥ה <S%H2416><s%> beasts רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> I cause noisome אַעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> to pass through בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְשִׁכְּלָ֑תָּה <S%H7921><s%> and they spoil וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> became שְׁמָמָה֙ <S%H8077><s%> it so that it be desolate מִבְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> no עוֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> that no man may pass through מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because הַחַיָּֽה׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the beasts

שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> [Though] these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵלֶּה֮ <S%H428><s%> these בְּתוֹכָהּ֒ <S%H8432><s%> [were] in it חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> either בָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> neither sons וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or בָּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> nor daughters יַצִּ֑ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> they shall deliver הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They לְבַדָּם֙ <S%H905><s%> alone יִנָּצֵ֔לוּ <S%H5337><s%> they only shall be delivered וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> but the land תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <S%H8077><s%> shall be desolate

א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword אָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> Or [if] I bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon that land הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאָמַרְתִּ֗י <S%H559><s%> and say חֶ֚רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Sword תַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> go through בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> so that I cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and beast

וּשְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> Though these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵלֶּה֮ <S%H428><s%> even these בְּתוֹכָהּ֒ <S%H8432><s%> [were] in it חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יַצִּ֖ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> they shall deliver בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> neither sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> nor daughters כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they לְבַדָּ֖ם <S%H905><s%> alone יִנָּצֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H5337><s%> but they only shall be delivered

א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or דֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> a pestilence אֲשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> Or [if] I send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into that land הַהִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֨י <S%H8210><s%> and pour out חֲמָתִ֤י <S%H2534><s%> my fury עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> in בְּדָ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> upon it in blood לְהַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> from it man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and beast

וְנֹ֨חַ <S%H5146><s%> Though Noah [דָּנִאֵל כ] (דָּנִיאֵ֣ל <S%H1840><s%> Daniel ק) וְאִיּוֹב֮ <S%H347><s%> and Job בְּתוֹכָהּ֒ <S%H8432><s%> [were] in it חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> nor בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> neither son אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or בַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> daughter יַצִּ֑ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> they shall deliver הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> by בְצִדְקָתָ֖ם <S%H6666><s%> by their righteousness יַצִּ֥ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> they shall [but] deliver נַפְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H5315><s%> their own souls פ

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> when כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when אַרְבַּ֣עַת <S%H702><s%> my four שְׁפָטַ֣י ׀ <S%H8201><s%> judgments הָרָעִ֡ים <S%H7451><s%> sore חֶ֠רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword וְרָעָ֞ב <S%H7458><s%> and the famine וְחַיָּ֤ה <S%H2416><s%> beast רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> and the noisome וָדֶ֔בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and the pestilence שִׁלַּ֖חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> How much more when I send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem לְהַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> from it man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and beast

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold נֽוֹתְרָה־ <S%H3498><s%> Yet behold therein shall be left בָּ֜הּ פְּלֵטָ֗ה <S%H6413><s%> a remnant הַֽמּוּצָאִים֮ <S%H3318><s%> that shall be brought forth בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> [both] sons וּבָנוֹת֒ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters הִנָּם֙ <S%H2005><s%> are going יוֹצְאִ֣ים <S%H3318><s%> behold they shall come forth אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to you וּרְאִיתֶ֥ם <S%H7200><s%> unto you and ye shall see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> their way וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <S%H5949><s%> and their doings וְנִחַמְתֶּ֗ם <S%H5162><s%> and ye shall be comforted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> concerning the evil אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> that I have brought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵבֵ֖אתִי <S%H935><s%> [even] concerning all that I have brought עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְנִחֲמ֣וּ <S%H5162><s%> And they shall comfort אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when תִרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> you when ye see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכָּ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> their ways וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <S%H5949><s%> and their doings וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> when לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not חִנָּ֤ם <S%H2600><s%> without cause עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6213><s%> that I have not done אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> all that I have done בָ֔הּ נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> in it saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
